description: This file defines API routes for managing skills and lessons in a content catalog, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting skills and lessons. It uses FastAPI framework with MongoDB as the database, and includes admin-only restrictions for modification endpoints.

classes.name: SkillModel
classes.description: Data model for a skill, used for creating and updating skill documents.

classes.name: LessonModel
classes.description: Data model for a lesson, including quiz and badge info.

classes.name: QuizQuestionModel
classes.description: Data model representing a quiz question within a lesson.

classes.name: MongoCatalogRepository
classes.description: Repository class encapsulating MongoDB operations for skills and lessons.

methods.name: MongoCatalogRepository get_repo()
methods.description: Dependency function to instantiate and ensure indexes on the MongoCatalogRepository.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_skills( category: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by category"), difficulty: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by difficulty"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number"), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Items per page"), search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search term against name/description/tags"), repo: MongoCatalogRepository = Depends(get_repo), )
methods.description: Handles GET request to list skills with optional filters and pagination.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] get_skill(slug: str, repo: MongoCatalogRepository = Depends(get_repo))
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve details of a specific skill by slug.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_skill(payload: SkillModel, repo: MongoCatalogRepository = Depends(get_repo))
methods.description: Handles POST request to create a new skill document, restricted to admins.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] update_skill( slug: str, updates: Dict[str, Any], repo: MongoCatalogRepository = Depends(get_repo) )
methods.description: Handles PUT request to update an existing skill identified by slug, admin-only.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] delete_skill(slug: str, repo: MongoCatalogRepository = Depends(get_repo))
methods.description: Handles DELETE request to remove a skill by slug, admin-only.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] list_lessons_for_skill(slug: str, repo: MongoCatalogRepository = Depends(get_repo))
methods.description: Retrieves list of lessons associated with a specific skill slug.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] get_lesson(slug: str, repo: MongoCatalogRepository = Depends(get_repo))
methods.description: Fetches detailed information on a lesson by slug.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_lesson(payload: LessonModel, repo: MongoCatalogRepository = Depends(get_repo))
methods.description: Creates a new lesson document, admin-only.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] update_lesson( slug: str, updates: Dict[str, Any], repo: MongoCatalogRepository = Depends(get_repo) )
methods.description: Updates a lesson by slug, with quiz validation if included, admin-only.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] delete_lesson(slug: str, repo: MongoCatalogRepository = Depends(get_repo))
methods.description: Deletes a lesson by slug, admin-only.
